article: I am a team leader in an insurance company. We are going through a lot of changes right now, which is _ much stress for all of us.A few weeks ago I was having a day so _ that I even doubted if I had the ability to do this challenging work, and was about ready to change to a less stressful job _ . Something happened that day to change my way of _ and I am so appreciative of this young lady. I want to let her know that the small act _ .On the top of my cubicle I have a small collection of lighthouses to let people know where I am sitting _ my team members have to find me for emergencies.That day I came into the office and was about to get the day _ when Crystal came over. l asked if she needed anything. She said, "I _ you something. " I looked at her with a _ look and said, "Well, thank you, but why _ you buy me anything?" I had never spoke to this young lady _ . She said, "Every day I stand up and look across the _ and see your lighthouses. Then I feel I am not alone and I encourage myself that there are always _ things in life. I saw this on the way to work and thought _ would like it. I wish it would have the same _ as your Lighthouses do. " In her hand she had a small globe with a Lighthouse and a ship on it. I gave her a hug and _ her. I don"t think she knows how much that small act of _ changed my day: 1 remained _ the rest of the day.For anyone that reads this, I hope you remember, no matter what the _ is, you could changesomeone"s day, _ even his views on life
